title: Having issues with making phonecalls when driving.
content:
I have a Google Pixel 4a, and have had no issues connecting it to the Bluetooth in my car and making calls until the other day. 
Now when I try to make a call, it starts ringing and then disconnects on the car saying "An error has occured", whilst the phone calls for a second and then says the system is busy, try again later. I haven't had any issues previously with an iPhone, or with this phone. Can anyone help please? Thank you
